question: What happened to my wrist?
question_content: I fell backwards and hit my hand on a hard floor during basketball. It was bent back and pretty much had all my weight on it. it went numb for about a minute then i felt a little pain but I kept playing. I didn't ice it because there was no sign of sweeling but when i woke up the next morning it hurt even more then the day before. It is really painful to bend it frontwards or back and moving my fingers certain ways hurts. Should i go to the hospital ?

answers.answer_content: Get an XRAY DONE...........faster cureIn the meantimeuse a medicated bandage over the area!
It is probably sprained, so apply some ice, and if it doesn't get any better, then definitely go to the hospital!
